name: Indie Night Funkin
description:
Indie Night Funkin is a Fangame of the video game Friday Night Funkin (FNF) Developed by Luife, Nabo and Moe!

Face off against the king of a castle in this indie recreation of Friday Night Funkin, featuring:

- 2 Clashes accompanied by totally new and original music. - Cinematics between each confrontation. - Graphic style recreated from scratch (Except for arrows)

We hope you enjoy it!
